name: UserLook
author: UserLook

sections.description:
UserLook – real time analytics of your blog activity.

UserLook WordPress plugin – allow easy to integrate UserLook tracking code to your blog.

Be aware of what is happening in your blog, find out about it first.

Live dashboard – updates instantly with every action that occurs on your website. You get a quick overview of exactly what’s happening without refreshing.

Please note, this plugin requires a account on UserLook
UserLook service cost, starting from 4.95 monthly, we have free 15 days evaluation period.

Plugin support community
sections.installation:
Follow simple steps to add UserLook tracking to your blog.

  1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open plugin settings and fill required fields, only your blog url and site ID from UserLook required for initial setup.
sections.faq:
Where i can request suggestions additional for additional features?

Feel free to ask your suggestions on our support community.
sections.changelog:

  • Added support for WordPress from 2.8

1.0.2

  • Added link to Live Dashboard from plugin settings

1.0.3

  • Updated installation details (more detailed instruction, where to get ID)
